description.plain:
SALES is an American guitar-based pop band from Orlando, Florida. The band’s members are musicians Lauren Morgan and Jordan Shih.

In July 2014, the band was named “Ones to Watch” for the second half of the year by The Hype Machine for being one the most blogged artists yet to release an LP.

The band is independent and self-released their first 7" Single renee/tonka time on December 1, 2013 through the music platform Bandcamp.

body.plain:
SALES is an American guitar-based pop band from Orlando, Florida. The band’s members are musicians Lauren Morgan and Jordan Shih.

In July 2014, the band was named “Ones to Watch” for the second half of the year by The Hype Machine for being one the most blogged artists yet to release an LP.

The band is independent and self-released their first 7" Single renee/tonka time on December 1, 2013 through the music platform Bandcamp.

songs.title: Chinese New Year

description.plain:
Chinese New Year is the third single for SALES’s debut Self Titled EP released on January 31, 2014. The song was later supported by a music video from Alana Questell’s three-part live video series SALES from 12 to 12.

In an interview with Bandcamp Daily, Lauren Morgan talks about how the song is about her mental state before and after moving to Tallahassee.

The track received a significant boost in popularity in 2020 following its involvement in a variety of dance and other video clips hosted on the app Tik-Tok.

songs.embed_content: Read “Chinese New Year” by SALES on Genius

songs.title: ​pope is a rockstar

description.plain: The song is from the perspective of someone walking away from a relationship and ignoring the confrontation. They’re tired of fighting.

songs.title: ​renee

description.plain: In a recent Santa Ana show, the lead singer of SALES, Lauren Morgan, described how this song is about when your at a bar/club and you meet someone you think is “your perfect soulmate” but you are only with them, talking, for that single drunken night and never again. Renee is the name of the girl who the guitarist of the band, Jordan, had this type of one night interaction with
